advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
"With expert ratings and thousands of data points, it's like a well-curated music feed, but for booze.” -- Gizmodo.com 

"It’s like having one of those snooty liquor connoisseurs on call, in your pocket. Except no annoying mustache. " -- Yahoo! Tech 

"It feels almost like a throwback startup. Booze Google." -- Business Insider 

Distiller is your companion, guide, and collection as you grow the whiskey side of your life. Get a personalized whiskey recommendation for any situation, whether you’re at a bar with your friends, growing your personal collection, discovering a new flavor, or giving a gift. We go beyond the label to offer suggestions based on your tastes matched with the unique characteristics of each bottle. 

• Find, follow, and share opinions with other whiskey lovers 
• Read what other users think about other whiskeys 
• See what your friends are doing in Distiller through your new Activity Feed 
• Get personalized recommendations 
• Rate bottles for tailored whiskey suggestions 
• Add favorites to your Top Shelf 
• Build your digital collection to keep track of your whiskeys 
• Share your list as a not-so-subtle hint for the perfect gift! 
• Write your own tasting notes to document your whiskey journey 
• Rate whiskeys with the community 
• Unique Distiller Rating from our Tasting Table whiskey expert panel 

Distiller’s proprietary algorithm analyzes tens-of-thousands of data points across the complex flavors of whiskey along with the more discoverable attributes like price, reputation, and even "giftability". This algorithm produces the Distiller Flavor Profile, a new way of visualizing the whiskey’s flavor notes, and compares it to other bottles to help you find your best match.
releaseNotes:
** Fixed bugs with social authentication.

Introducing the Distiller Community! 

• New NOTES Tab on Bottle Pages: Read notes from other Distiller community members. 
• Liking and Commenting: Users are now part of a community and can like and comment on what other users are saying about each whiskey in Distiller. 
• Following: Users can now follow one another, see their Top Shelf, Collection, Wishlist, and read their reviews. 
• Activity Feed: Users now have an activity feed on their profile showing everything the people they follow have been up to in Distiller! 
• People Search: Users can search for fellow whiskey lovers by toggling between “Whiskeys” and “People” on the search page, and can follow them directly from the search results. 
• Notes can be set private if you'd like to keep them to yourself! 

Minor Updates: 

• Add your own notes directly from the footer menu 
• You can finally clear your 5 star ratings by clicking the newly added "Clear" button once you've rated a whiskey. 
• Power users are now recommended when searching for people.
